data.title: Yep. It's terrible. - Brickleberry (2012) Discussion
data.meta_description:
I forced myself to sit through the entire pilot episode (which you can see for free on Comedy Central's site - just google it) and I'm afraid that words can't really convey how dumb and un-funny this series really is.

The sad pathetic part is that this show desperately wants to be Family Guy, and it shows. However this show has none of the comedy, sophistication, or timing that Family Guy does - it's just one crude joke after another. Brickleberry commits the ultimate comedic crime in my book: it thinks it's a whole lot more clever/funny than it really is.

I really hope Comedy Central pulls the plug on this series sooner rather than later. It's just so un-funny, poorly written, poorly voice-acted, and a blatant rip-off of Family Guy (minus any sort of sophistication or cleverness)


"I've owed you this for a long time, and I pay my debts...to the penny"
data.text:
Yep. It's terrible.

I forced myself to sit through the entire pilot episode (which you can see for free on Comedy Central's site - just google it) and I'm afraid that words can't really convey how dumb and un-funny this series really is.

The sad pathetic part is that this show desperately wants to be Family Guy, and it shows. However this show has none of the comedy, sophistication, or timing that Family Guy does - it's just one crude joke after another. Brickleberry commits the ultimate comedic crime in my book: it thinks it's a whole lot more clever/funny than it really is.

I really hope Comedy Central pulls the plug on this series sooner rather than later. It's just so un-funny, poorly written, poorly voice-acted, and a blatant rip-off of Family Guy (minus any sort of sophistication or cleverness)

"I've owed you this for a long time, and I pay my debts...to the penny"

thepotatoHasEyes

with a name like "dark domino", i have to wonder , is that the best person to listen to about comedy-- are you clinically depressed?...."forcing" yourself to sit through comedy and not laugh? lighten up , it IS a funny show , and with the varied humor in the show , if you didnt find ONE thing funny?? uh, ya, up your dose and find a therapist -- i watch a TON-not a factual ton-of comedy and brickleberry is funnier than most of what is out there --hence , the Actual ratings of the show and fan demand for another season--- the people have spoken.

NOW JUST START THE MOVIE
